file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-31-02-04 - FAN BLADE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FAN BLADE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the fan blade. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 72-31-02-000-801-A FAN BLADE - REMOVAL ALL 72-31-02-400-801-A FAN BLADE - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-31-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-31-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FAN BLADE - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine air intake 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine air intake I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN ( AMM MPP 71-00-00/200) TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • START 1/2. (2) Put the workstand in the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 72-31-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A CAUTION: DO NOT LET THE FAN ROTOR ASSEMBLY TURN COUNTERCLOCKWISE WHEN YOU LOOK AT THE ROTOR FROM ITS FRONT. IF THE FAN ROTOR ASSEMBLY TURNS COUNTERCLOCKWISE, IT WILL CAUSE DAMAGE TO THE BRUSH SEALS. (1) Remove the Fan Blade. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 72-31-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-31-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FAN BLADE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine air intake 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine air intake I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN ( AMM MPP 71-00-00/200) TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. CAUTION: DO NOT LET THE FAN ROTOR ASSEMBLY TURN COUNTERCLOCKWISE WHEN YOU LOOK AT THE ROTOR FROM ITS FRONT. IF THE FAN ROTOR ASSEMBLY TURNS COUNTERCLOCKWISE, IT WILL CAUSE DAMAGE TO THE BRUSH SEALS. (1) Install the Fan Blade. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 72-31-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the workstand. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • START 1/2. (3) Refer to the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 to do the related check procedures after an engine LRU maintenance procedure, as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 72-31-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
